main_definition: Lessons refer to the knowledge, skills or experiences gained through learning or teaching.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Instructive examples or illustrations that provide a deeper understanding of a subject
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher used real-life lessons to help students understand the theory.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A unit of instruction given by a teacher in an educational setting
meanings_and_examples.example: Mathematics 101 is my favorite class, and each week we have new lessons on different topics.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Insights or understanding gained through experiences, whether personal or professional
meanings_and_examples.example: Through his career in finance, he learned many valuable lessons about risk management.
